snippet: Rising university tuition costs are encouraging British students to consider studying overseas, while worries about high costs and debt are deterring United States students from going abroad, a survey shows.
lead_paragraph: Rising university tuition costs are encouraging British students to consider studying overseas, while worries about high costs and debt are deterring United States students from going abroad, a survey shows.

headline.main: Costs Drive Both Sides of Study Abroad
headline.print_headline: Costs Drive Both Sides of Study Abroad
